articles.title: Boy, 6, spends $16,000 playing Sonic Forces mobile game | World - The Times
articles.description: Earlier this year Jessica Johnson discovered someone was buying items worth thousands of dollars and charging them to her bank account. That person turned out to be her six-year-old son.In the space
